name: Impresa - Sociedade Gestora de Participações Sociais, S.A.
goal: In 2016, the Group IMPRESA Group turnover has reached 206 M€, making it the largest media group in Portugal. Its activity is divided into two business areas – SIC e IMPRESA Publishing, with interests that include a television station, 7 thematic channels, the newspaper Expresso, an extensive portfolio of magazines, various Internet websites and applications, a technologies company, as well as interests in the distribution company.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives: Modernisation of legal framework for the enforcement of intellectual property rights; Satellite and Cable Directive review; Publishers' Rights; Geo-blocking; Portability of online content services; Review of AVMS Directive; Tax reform for media sector; Pluralism and diversity; Commercial communications; Protection of consummers; Collective Rights Management; EU telecoms rules; Online platforms; illegal content in the internet; e-privacy Directive; Data protection; Cybersecurity; European Cloud Initiative
